Boo is a shy ghost who is part of Bowser\'s court. He is known for being mischievous and only moves when no one is looking at him.
Bowser is the king of the Koopas and Mario\'s arch-enemy. His great size and strength make him a formidable rival.
Bowser Jr. is Bowser\'s son, following in his father\'s footsteps in the fight against Mario. He is mischievous and full of energy.
Daisy is the princess of Sarasaland and a friend of Peach. She is outgoing, energetic, and adventurous.
Diddy is Donkey Kong\'s loyal companion. He is agile, fast, and always ready for action.
Donkey Kong is a strong gorilla and protector of Kong Island. Although he has a rough side, he is very loyal to his friends.
Luigi is Mario\'s brother and a bit shyer than him, but always ready to help on the adventure.
Mario is the main hero of the Mushroom Kingdom, always ready to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser\'s clutches.
Peach is the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. Although often captured by Bowser, she knows how to defend herself when necessary.
Rosalina is the guardian of the cosmos and adoptive mother of the Lumas. She is wise, calm, and powerful.
Toad is a resident of the Mushroom Kingdom, loyal to Princess Peach. Although small, he is fast and hardworking.
Waluigi is Luigi\'s rival and is known for his sneaky nature and sports skills.
Wario is Mario\'s rival, greedy and strong. Although greedy, he is also cunning and always looking out for his own benefit.
Yoshi is a friendly dinosaur and Mario\'s loyal companion. He can eat enemies with his long tongue.
Invisibility – Boo can turn invisible and pass through walls when no one is looking at him.
Flame Breath – Bowser can breathe fire from his mouth, burning everything in his path.
Koopa Cannon – Bowser Jr. uses his vehicle equipped with cannons to fire projectiles.
Flower Strike – Daisy can summon a burst of flowers to attack enemies or enhance her abilities.
Jet Pack – Diddy can fly using his jetpack to reach high places or dodge attacks.
Power Punch – Donkey Kong can deliver a powerful punch that knocks down enemies.
Super Jump – Luigi can jump higher than Mario, allowing him to reach higher platforms.
Wall Jump – Mario can jump between walls to reach difficult places or dodge attacks.
Float – Peach can float in the air for a short period, giving her an advantage in long jumps.
Star Magic – Rosalina can control the stars to launch powerful cosmic energy attacks.
Mushroom Speed – Toad can run at high speed, outrunning his enemies in short races.
Vine Trap – Waluigi can plant vines that slow down and trap his opponents.
Crushing Impact – Wario can charge an attack to crush enemies with his body.
Kick Jump – Yoshi can jump followed by a kick to eliminate enemies and destroy blocks.
